-   [struct RUNTIME_FUNCTION](../build/struct-runtime-function.md)  
  
-   [struct UNWIND_INFO](../build/struct-unwind-info.md)  
  
-   [struct UNWIND_CODE](../build/struct-unwind-code.md)  
  
-   [鏈結的回溯資訊結構](../build/chained-unwind-info-structures.md)
